title: The Sims 4
summary: The Sims 4 is a 2014 social simulation game developed by Maxis and published by Electronic Arts. It is the fourth major title in The Sims series. It was announced on May 6, 2013, and released in September 2014 for Microsoft Windows. Versions for macOS were released worldwide on February 17, 2015, and PlayStation 4 and Xbox One consoles worldwide on November 17, 2017.
